owner.name: Hanzala Saify
owner.title: AI Developer & Cybersecurity Enthusiast
owner.summary: Full-stack software engineer and AI specialist with hands-on experience building production-grade AI systems, RAG pipelines, multi-agent platforms, and web applications. Passionate about the intersection of cybersecurity and artificial intelligence. Proficient across the full development lifecycle — from designing scalable backends with FastAPI and Node.js to crafting polished frontends with React and Next.js.

projects.title: Fourbyte ChatApp
projects.description: Anonymous, real-time room-based chat application. No login, no database — just pure, ephemeral conversation with 4-digit room codes and WebSocket-powered messaging.
projects.longDescription: FOURBYTE is a minimalist, privacy-first chat application where conversations happen in real-time within ephemeral rooms. No account creation, no data persistence — just instant, anonymous communication. Built with Angular 21 frontend and Node.js/Express backend, featuring a distinctive 'Terminal Noir' design aesthetic.
features: Fully Anonymous — no registration, no tracking, no data storage
4-Digit Room Codes — simple, memorable room identifiers
Auto-Reconnection — seamless recovery from network issues

projects.title: MarketMuse AI
projects.description: Comprehensive multi-agent AI marketing platform with 10 distinct AI agents, real-time token-based billing, full-cycle campaign management dashboard, and n8n webhook integrations.
projects.longDescription: MarketMuse AI revolutionizes digital marketing workflows through 10 specialized AI agents. Features real-time token-based billing with Supabase, a campaign analytics dashboard, and n8n webhook automation for complex multi-step marketing pipelines.
features: 10 Distinct AI Agents for specialized marketing tasks
Real-time token-based billing and usage tracking
n8n webhook integration for workflow automation

projects.title: ChartGenie
projects.description: Full-stack AI-powered data visualization platform that transforms raw CSVs into 7+ interactive dashboard types using React, Apache ECharts, and a high-performance RAG system powered by Groq's LPU.
projects.longDescription: ChartGenie lets users upload CSV files and instantly generates interactive dashboards. The integrated RAG system — built with Groq's ultra-fast LPU and Supabase Edge Functions — enables natural language queries over the uploaded data.
features: 7+ interactive chart types with Apache ECharts

projects.title: PropertyRAG
projects.description: Production-grade real estate intelligence platform using RAG with a FastAPI backend featuring 9-intent classification, deterministic analytics engine, and hybrid search with CrossEncoder re-ranking.
projects.longDescription: PropertyRAG provides accurate, context-aware answers about real estate properties. The FastAPI backend classifies queries into 9 intents, runs a hybrid semantic + keyword search, and applies CrossEncoder re-ranking for high-confidence multi-turn responses.

projects.title: Room-wise Object Detection
projects.description: Computer vision application using YOLOv8 and Streamlit to detect and analyze household objects across rooms, with a full analytics dashboard and batch processing module.

projects.title: Customer Churn Retention
projects.description: Machine learning model predicting telecom customer churn using feature engineering, model selection, and evaluation to improve customer retention strategies.

certifications.name: Certified Ethical Hacker v13 AI (Ongoing)
certifications.description: Advanced ethical hacking certification with AI-powered penetration testing, threat detection, and cybersecurity methodologies.

certifications.name: AWS Academy Graduate – Cloud Architecting
certifications.description: Comprehensive training in designing scalable and secure cloud architectures on AWS.

certifications.name: Data Analyst in Python, Tableau & SQL
certifications.description: Data cleaning, visualization, and analysis using Python, SQL, and Tableau.

certifications.name: Ethical Hacking From Scratch
certifications.description: Practical ethical hacking and penetration testing including WiFi hacking, MITM attacks, and exploitation.

certifications.name: Google Cybersecurity Professional Certificate
certifications.description: Hands-on cybersecurity training covering network security, SOC, SIEM, incidents, vulnerabilities, and risk management.

certifications.name: MERN Stack Development – 30 Days of Code
certifications.description: Full-stack web development using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js.

certifications.name: Google Cloud Fundamentals
certifications.description: Foundational training in Google Cloud services, networking, compute, IAM, and deployments.
